THE JUSTLY FAMOUS POLO LOUNGE OF THE BEVERLY HILLS HOTEL
reviews.text: Started the meal off with a mimosa followed by crab cakes and then the burger(I decided to order the more boring option!!) however plenty to choose from on a delicious menu. For two of us the bill including gratuity $240 but worth every penny.

reviews.title: Excellent Breakfast
reviews.text: The remodel of the hotel lobby and update of the patio at the Polo Lounge is a success! This wonderful property has been re imagined to retain what is best and taking it up a notch. If you can go, you must! There is no other place you can go that has a more storied history. We had a nice big booth in the rear that overlooked the intire patio while giving us a feeling of privacy. The food is wonderful with many dishes being created table side. I do think the servers could be a little more personal, I know they are working and there every day, but for many this is a once in a lifetime experience. This is not to say service is bad, hardly, but a little more upbeat service would only add to the wonerful ambiance of this magical restaurant. Please take a moment to walk the grounds they are simply put "Fabulous " .

reviews.title: Freshened but Unchanged
